job_title: PMP Project Manager with Devops Azure Exp
jd: From: Sachin, Sspearhead Inc. sachin@sspearhead.com Reply to: sachin@sspearhead.com Job Details:PMP Project Manager with Devops Azure Exp- Day 1 onsiteAlbany, NYLong Tern Mandatory Qualification Project Manager Plans, organizes and integrates cross-functional information technology projects that are significant in scope and impact. Expert 84+ months: Candidate is able to provide guidance to large teams and/or has extensive industry experience and is considered at the top of his/her field. Qualification Number Requested Qualifications:1. 84 Months of Experience monitoring tasks for analysis, design and development activities and assisting in the development of a detailed work plan 2. 84 months experience in meeting and work session facilitation. 3. 60 months creating and tracking project tasks using DevOps Azure 4. 60 months experience coordinating issue resolution 5. 60 Months experience creating and executing project management plans, including communication and risk/issue management plans 6. 60 months experience communicating project information to multiple stakeholders 7. 48 months experience facilitating meetings and JAD Sessions with IT teams, business partners and project management teams to produce system documentation, documentation walkthroughs, and to obtain the appropriate approvals for project documentation. 8. 48 months experience creating/documenting business process models and business rules 9. Bachelor’s Degree 10. Project Management Professional Certification Thanks,SachinSspearhead Inc.www.Sspearhead.com
